CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In addition , both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO display prominent vibronic shoulders at shorter wavelengths , implying an ordered arrangement in their solid films , with strong π-π stacking between the polymeric backbonesa feature that also appears in the spectra of regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) , which is beneficial to improve the charge mobility of resulting films.

Let's think step by step.

1. PzNDTDTBT
2. PzNDTDTBO
3. Regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)

These are the Material Names mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. PzNDTDTBT
2. PzNDTDTBO
3. P3HT

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PzNDTDTBT |
| PzNDTDTBO |
| regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In addition , both PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO display prominent vibronic shoulders at shorter wavelengths , implying an ordered arrangement in their solid films , with strong π-π stacking between the polymeric backbonesa feature that also appears in the spectra of regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) , which is beneficial to improve the charge mobility of resulting films.

Let's think step by step.

1. PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO: These are the names of two polymers. In the context of the paragraph, they can be considered as "Property Value" entities as they have specific properties (prominent vibronic shoulders at shorter wavelengths and ordered arrangement in their solid films) that are being discussed.
2. Strong π-π stacking: This is a property of the solid films of the polymers PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO, as well as regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT). It can be considered as a "Property Value" entity as it is a specific characteristic of these materials.
3. Charge mobility: This is a property of the resulting films from the polymers. It is mentioned as being improved by the feature of strong π-π stacking, so it can be considered as a "Property Value" entity.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. Strong π-π stacking: This is a property of the solid films of the polymers PzNDTDTBT, PzNDTDTBO, and regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT). It can be considered as a "Property Value" entity as it is a specific characteristic of these materials that affects their charge mobility.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value                   |
|-------------------------------|
| Strong π-π stacking in solid films of PzNDTDTBT, PzNDTDTBO, and regioregular poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT) |
